> Sure, but you're still simulating passing parameters to methods by
> passing them to your constructors. Not the most intuitive way.

It becomes more intuitive once you understand that you are not passing
parameters to methods, but to test cases. Doing this as method parameters
certainly is one way, just not the Junit way.

Cheers, Ilja
